snippet.title: Miniatures - Step into four hand-drawn memories and discover the mysteries lurking inside the box!
snippet.description:
Purchase on itch.io https://othertales.itch.io/miniatures?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt Inside an old wooden box lies four curious items: a toy lizard, a captured moth, a screwdriver and a seashell. Each one has its own story to tell…

Step into four hand-drawn memories and discover the mysteries lurking beneath the seemingly calm surface. Explore one story at a time, or play them in a single sitting, in this solo-play adventure about the stories we tell ourselves and how they shape our world. 

➡️ More from Other Tales https://othertales.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More puzzle games https://itch.io/games/genre-puzzle?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
